references.paper_title: PointNet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This foundational paper introduced PointNet, a groundbreaking deep learning architecture for processing point cloud data, which significantly impacted subsequent 3D object detection methods.

references.paper_title: PV-RCNN: Point-voxel feature set abstraction for 3d object detection
references.reason: This highly influential work introduced PV-RCNN, a two-stage 3D object detector that effectively combines point and voxel representations, leading to significant improvements in accuracy.

references.paper_title: PointPillars: Fast encoders for object detection from point clouds
references.reason: PointPillars is a highly efficient one-stage 3D object detector known for its speed and effectiveness, setting a benchmark for real-time applications.

references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: This recent work introduced the Mamba model, a state-space model that achieves linear time complexity, providing a strong theoretical foundation for the Voxel Mamba model proposed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Embracing single stride 3d object detector with sparse transformer
references.reason: This paper is a highly relevant prior work by members of the same research group as the target paper, proposing a single-stride 3D detector leveraging sparse transformers, an approach that directly influenced the Voxel Mamba design.
